articles.description: This is the very first foldable smartphone from OnePlus
articles.content:
Summary
  • OnePlus is set to launch its first-ever foldable smartphone, the OnePlus Open, on October 19, according to a leak from tipster Max Jambor.
  • The launch date puts OnePlus in … [+3209 chars]
